title: BRIEF-Moody's Says South Africa Banking Outlook Is Stable On Sound Finances Despite Weak Economy
text:
BRIEF-Moody's Says South Africa Banking Outlook Is Stable On Sound Finances Despite Weak Economy

Stock Markets 43 minutes ago (Sep 10, 2019 03:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Moody's Says South Africa Banking Outlook Is Stable On Sound Finances Despite Weak Economy Sept 9 (Reuters) - MOODY'S: * SAYS SOUTH AFRICA BANKING OUTLOOK IS STABLE ON SOUND FINANCES DESPITE WEAK ECONOMY * MOODY'S- SOUTH AFRICA'S BANKS' CAPITAL WILL BE RESILIENT AND PROFITABILITY WILL STAY FIRM

BRIEF-Moody's Says South Africa Banking Outlook Is Stable On Sound Finances Despite Weak Economy
